title: cant connect to server
body: Every time i try to log in and start the game i get an error saying it cant connect to the server, but it logs me into the client, just tells me to reconnect and so on and so on

replies.body: That's most likely being caused by your last match never properly ending. When the match doesn't tell your client that the game is over, your client thinks it still exists and keeps trying to reconnect you. Thankfully these ghost games clear themselves up after enough time, have you been able to get back in yet?
